dcterms:creator: J. Hajič
M. Straka
J. Straková
dcterms:description: The Prague Dependency Treebank 3.5 contains the same texts as the previous versions since 2.0, and is divided into train, dtest, and etest subparts, where dtest is used as a development set and etest as a test set. The dataset consists of several layers – the morphological m-layer is the largest and contains morphological annotations (POS tags and lemmas), the analytical a-layer contains labeled dependency trees, and the t-layer is the smallest and contains tectogrammatical trees.
dcterms:title: Prague Dependency Treebank 3.5

dcterms:creator: J. Nivre
M. C. de Marneffe
F. Ginter

R. Tsarfaty
D. Zeman
dcterms:description: The Universal Dependencies project seeks to develop cross-linguistically consistent treebank annotation of morphology and syntax for many languages. The Czech PDT treebank of UD 2.3 is an automated conversion of PDT 3.5 a-layer to Universal Dependencies annotation.
dcterms:title: Universal Dependencies 2.3

dcterms:creator: M. Ševčíková
Z. Zabokrtský
J. Straková
M. Straka
dcterms:description: The Czech Named Entity Corpus 1.1 is a corpus of 5,868 Czech sentences with manually annotated 33,662 Czech named entities, classified according to a two-level hierarchy of 62 named entities.
dcterms:title: Czech Named Entity Corpus 1.1

dcterms:creator: M. Ševčíková
Z. Zabokrtský
J. Straková
M. Straka
dcterms:description: The Czech Named Entity Corpus 2.0 contains 8,993 Czech sentences with manually annotated 35,220 Czech named entities, classified according to a two-level hierarchy of 46 named entities.
dcterms:title: Czech Named Entity Corpus 2.0
